decks.notes: This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a combination of efficient creatures and removal spells. It includes cards like Sentinel of the Nameless City and Mosswood Dreadknight to apply early pressure, while also utilizing removal spells like Go for the Throat and Maelstrom Pulse to deal with opposing threats. The deck also includes resilient threats like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Thrun, Breaker of Silence to help maintain board presence. With a balance of aggression and disruption, this deck aims to outpace and outmaneuver the opponent to secure victory.
